title: 1.618 Seconds Later (Person of Interest)(2 x 21)
author: Person of Interest Highlights
comment:
1:56 “1.618 seconds later …” 

Finch chose that interval of 1.618 seconds for the sake of math aesthetics. He’s into phi, the golden ratio. Not for nothing was he a substitute teacher in a high school math class in an earlier episode this season. He dazzled the students teaching them about pi. He’s good with phi too.
description:
Harold explains The Machine to Root.
